info.title: Telecom Data
info.description: This data API from DataWeave provides details of all recharge options available with various telecom operators (India) across all circles. The data is aggregated from the websites of all telecom operators

get.description: This data API provides details of all recharge options available with various telecom operators across all circles. The data is aggregated from the websites of all telecom operators

parameters.name: circle
parameters.description: Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh (E), Chennai, Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Bihar, Kerala, North East, Orissa, Kolkata, Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, JK, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh (W), West Bengal, Punjab, Gujrat, Rajasthan

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: BSNL, Tata DOCOMO, Uninor, Idea, Aircel, Reliance CDMA, Reliance GSM, Vodafone, Airtel
